Te Kūiti baby death: Mother of Mustafa Ali breaks silence after baby farewelled at funeral https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/te-kuiti-baby-death-father-of-mustafa-ali-says-police-took-his-phone-a-month-earlier-couldnt-call-儿子救护车/ZD3VPBQZUJFUHIO5P5W72DEVIA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/te-kuiti-baby-death-father-of-mustafa-ali-says-police-took-his-phone-a-month-earlier-couldnt-call-儿子救护车/ZD3VPBQZUJFUHIO5P5W72DEVIA/'I love and miss you so much my boy.' Thu, 13 Jun 2024 08:12:07 +0000 Mukzameel Ali holding baby Mustafa Maheir Mukzameel Ali, who police say died a violent death on Saturday.
Coca-Cola, Canadian Club and Cody’s cans’ connection to clandestine lab near Tauranga https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/coca-cola-canadian-club-and-codys-cans-connection-to-clandestine-lab-near-tauranga/EHPBT72CORFMTKAWP7KZNUAIWU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/coca-cola-canadian-club-and-codys-cans-connection-to-clandestine-lab-near-tauranga/EHPBT72CORFMTKAWP7KZNUAIWU/ Hannah BartlettPolice allege the cans link the defendant to a clan lab in the lower Kaimai Ranges. Thu, 13 Jun 2024 05:00:00 +0000 Family lawyer Brintyn Smith thought he would die during an attack in a lift at the Whangārei Court House in March 2023. Today he shares his story about what happened. Photo / NZ Law Society
